args.natural_language_statement: Let z ∈ ℂ. Show that |cos z| ≥ |cos(Re z)|. Translate into Lean4 statement (no proof) ending with := by sorry.

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open scoped Real
open Complex
open Real
open Real

/-- Let z ∈ ℂ. Show that |cos z| ≥ |cos(Re z)|. Translate into Lean4 statement (no proof) ending with := by sorry. -/
theorem abs_cos_le_abs_re_extracted (z : ℂ) : Complex.abs (Complex.cos z) ≤ Complex.abs (Complex.cos ↑z.re) := sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- For any complex number z, the modulus of cos z is at least the modulus of cos (Re z). -/
theorem abs_cos_ge_abs_cos_re (z : ℂ) : Complex.abs (Complex.cos z) ≥ Complex.abs (Complex.cos (z.re : ℂ)) := by sorry
